title: (41550) Aguadulce - A-92

Quiet place in the middle of town during the week, recommended by people from the town since we asked where to sleep and they sent us there. Things to keep in mind: -In the open field right next to it there is a bar-concert hall -On Wednesdays there is a market, so if you sleep there on a Tuesday you may not be able to leave until noon. The photo is from google maps because we didn't take a photo the same day and I made the post later... they recently built some public toilets, but I don't know the hours of these toilets

Puente Genil, where "the sun becomes sweet". At the foot of the bike path, ideal for a walk with children. Although it has no connection with the oil greenway (for this, go to the old Campo Real station). Without services, possibility of toilets in supermarket.

Beautiful river with gorge, cave and climbing site. Very quiet and peaceful. Walk up the river 5 minutes to the gorge. Hike starts across the road to the cave. 
No sign that prohibits overnight parking or motorhomes.

name: Camping La Campina

description: Small family campsite, surrounded by olive groves. Were there in January and only with two other campers. Sanitary facilities tipptopp.

title: (29320) Campillos - Acceso Nte.
description: 5 pretty places where you can spend the day or the night. Close to the road but very quiet.

title: (14550) Montilla -
description: Cañalerma

title: (14550) Montilla - 2 Calle Edison
description: Good price automatic diesel station with water and air services. Toilet also next to family cash supermarket?

title: (14540) La Rambla - 11 Calle Redonda
description: Free water, on the petrol station

title: (14900) Lucena - 5D Ronda de San Francisco
description: Public laundry, from the Speed queen franchise.

title: (41661) Algámitas - SE-9233
description: Parking near the road with beautiful views, picnic area just below the parking lots. You can spend the night

title: (29320) Campillos - Unnamed Road
description: Place high above the Embalse de Guadalhorce for max 3 vehicles next to the road. Quiet at night. No prohibition signs, no service. Mobile phone satisfactory

title: (14900) Lucena - Co-6218
description: Dirt and stone parking going up to the sanctuary. No services. There is no prohibition sign. Nice views . uneven terrain. Very quiet at night, only cars that go up to the sanctuary

title: (14900) Lucena - CO-6218
description: Sierra de Aras, very close to the Sudbetica

title: (29320) Gobantes -
description: Access only with 4x4. Quiet place among olive trees overlooking the water, we spent the night with a roof top tent and we had no problem. We did pick up some paper but it is very clean overall.

title: (29320) Campillos -
description: View of the dam. Only one place available. Easy access by motorhome 6m50. Network okay

title: (29200) Antequera - Unnamed Road
description: Very beautiful, with a reservoir and without problems to spend the night. Ample space, silent in the middle of nowhere and very appealing. Amazing views, I hope you like it :)

title: (29320) Campillos - unamed road
description: Flat circular platform which must have been the foundation of some building a long time ago, next to a ruined house. Fantastic views to the lake. The access road although steep and dusty is actually not that bad for vans, probably a bit tricky for motorhomes however. There were a few midges buzzing around, annoying at worst. Mobile signal ok. If you follow the road opposite the platform, you can get to another spot by an unfinished house and also get acess to the lake but the locals know about this place and we saw a few cars going down in the night.

title: (29320) Campillos - Acceso Nte.
description: Small clearing near the road, close to two other open spaces indicated here on the site. Some points are flat and others are not, comfortable and quiet with some trees for shelter from the sun. Beautiful place.

title: (14900) Lucena - 22 Calle la Tinaja
description: Ample public parking to visit, five minutes from The Town Center

title: (29200) Antequera - Unnamed Road
description: Great spot with an epic view. close to the road but not much through traffic. It was a bit windy here so you might want to check the weather if you are planning on cooking or eating outdoors.

title: (14550) Montilla - 1D Avenida de las Camachas
description: Large car park, very quiet for the night, near Aldi and Bodega to visit, without service

title: (14900) Lucena - 4 Calle Las Acacias
description: Newly opened laundry from January 30, 2021

title: (29320) Campillos - Unnamed Road
description: Full land access at an angle because the road is elevated no problem with a van Large plateau with lake view

title: (14540) La Rambla - 31 Calle Carrera Baja
description:
Auto-caravans area available in La Rambla de Córdoba.
1 km from the center of the town. The area has a garbage and lighting container area. At 500 meters there is a large supermarket. At about 100 meters there is a gas station.

title: (29320) Gobantes -
description: Just off the road, slightly screened, road noise not a problem as it’s a very quiet road. Amazing sunsets, no services but near hiking paths. Please take your rubbish with you.

title: (29340) Cañete la Real - Cam. de Teba a Canete la Real
title_short: (29340) Cañete la Real - Cam. de Teba a Canete la Real
description: Little corner of paradise, at the exit of the village of Cañete le Real next to the secondary road. Splendid point of view on the valley and the surrounding mountains, one feels like alone in the world. Few passing cars. No villager came to complain about our presence. Ideal for spending the night before going to wear out your shoes on the footbridges of Caminito del Rey!

address.street: Cam. de Teba a Canete la Real

title: (14900) Lucena - 13 Ronda Cuatro Caminos
description: Parking without services, a bit noisy due to the proximity of the road, quiet night.

title: (29200) Antequera - Unnamed Road
description: Fantastic view of the reservoir. One place. Maximum 7 meters in length. The night very lonely and calm. The route is close to the road, but in 16 hours we counted only 3 cars. There is also a path that leads to Det Lake, however, seems to be only passable by Vans or 4x4.

title: (41540) La Puebla de Cazalla - 22 Polígono Industrial los Pollitos
title_short: (41540) La Puebla de Cazalla - 22 Polígono Industrial los Pollitos
description: Spectacular motorhome pitch in an arabesque village 70km from Seville. Each station, well defined and with enough space between one camper and the other, is equipped with supply and disposal and a pillar for the electricity connection (both normal and Schuko). There are also bathrooms with toilets and showers with hot water. Everything is free, maximum length of stay 72 hours. There is a small bar where you can eat and drink until late.

title: (29320) Peñarrubia - Unnamed Road
description: Hidden cute place in the middle of nowhere. Great for fishing and peaceful rest.

title: (41540) La Puebla de Cazalla - 28 Polígono Industrial los Pollitos
title_short: (41540) La Puebla de Cazalla - 28 Polígono Industrial los Pollitos
description: Washing machines and dryers at the Repsol gas station!

title: (29320) Gobantes -
description: Very nice spot on the side of the road but very little traffic at night, breathtaking view of the lake... for the anecdote, a fox visited us to snack...

title: (29320) Gobantes -
description: Flat spot next to the road but really quiet at night. Suitable for 1 or 2 vans. Beautiful view over the lake. Nice sunset. 4G good. It’s nature so keep it clean!

title: () Teba - Unnamed Road
description: What a shame, what once was a nice place has been ruined. long track down is almost undriveable, maybe in 4x4. huge amount of rubbish and faeces everywhere. water level of lake dropped so much that there's no level parking spots and we got stuck trying to get out.  planned on staying for just the night but driven away by local youth with load music and cops that came to move them on. will not be back. plenty more quiet places to the east of here thankfully.

title: (14550) Montilla - 1A Calle Asunción de Alvear
description: A place on the outskirts of town next to the municipal sports center with soccer, basketball and tennis courts. Municipal pool only in summer available with very good complex. nearby park for walking and exercising, popular restaurants also nearby very quiet and level area

title: (41661) Algámitas - 1 Carretera de Pruna
description: Viewpoint at the foot of the road but little traveled.

title: (29340) Cañete la Real - MA 7404
description: Abandoned parking lot. Calm spot. Flat terrain.

title: (29320) Gobantes -
description:
Nice private spot just behind the road. Flat surface.

I did not stay here, I was in one of the spots earlier down the road but found this when hiking around.

title: (14550) Montilla -
description: Point where you can stop to eat during the trip and even sleep. It is on the same road towards Montilla. We had to stop and very calmly.

title: (29320) Campillos - Unnamed Road
description: Nice quiet place protected from the wind, without any service!

title: (29320) Campillos -
description: With a fantastic view of the lake, next to the road but very quiet.

title: (29320) Campillos - Unnamed Road
description: Very beautiful place, very windy, foxes come to visit you at night for food. There is a sign that says it is forbidden to camp with a fine. We were here last year and the reservoir is empty compared to last time.

title: (29320) Campillos - Unnamed Road
description: In the wind, there is a suitable place for about 5 vehicles, graveled, surrounded by trees, no services or prohibition signs or height limitation, cell phone good, some noise in the morning from planes that drive to Malaga airport. Please leave clean again.

title: (29340) Cañete la Real - 7A Carretera Almargen
description: Good place to stay overnight and spend good days in nature. 200 meters from the white town of Cañete la Real, beautiful Moorish castle, 15th century church and convent, very clean historic town, bars and restaurants, pharmacy, supermarket, shops. Town hall and picturesque square, public swimming pool and various mountain water sources. Ideal site for hiking and biking.

title: (29320) Campillos - Unnamed Road
description: Just near El Chorro great mountain spot to park! Quiet

title: (29320) Ardales - Unnamed Road
description: It's a piece of road with a dead end towards the lake (depends on the water level how far you can go) on the way to this place (both sides) you have a dirt road with many other places to find! you can drive the dirt road for sure with your pickup truck. The exact spot in the picture doesn't have a view of the lake, it's just a really quiet spot! you can find spots with views in the area if you want.

title: (29340) Cañete la Real - 1 Calle Rafael Alberti
title_short: (29340) Cañete la Real - 1 Calle Rafael Alberti
description: Parking very close to the town center. I have not visited it yet, but on the bridge of the constitution I will and comment on the site. I think it is ideal to visit the town.

title: (29340) Cañete la Real - 31 Calle Sevilla
description: Parking for 10-12 vans or several ACs, flat, next to rubbish bins and a fountain, very close to the town's bakery. The other place that he puts in the town to park is difficult to maneuver.

title: (29320) Gobantes - Unnamed Road
description: Unadorned spacious gravel roadside parking lot.

title: (14550) Montilla - Calle Cuesta de la Peña
title_short: (14550) Montilla - Calle Cuesta de la Peña
description: Official camper area next to the tourist bus stop. Splendid views. Service of water, draining (gray and toilet) Paseo Cervantes, next to the gardens

title: (29320) Gobantes -
description:
Small place in the forest south of the car park already signposted by the roadside, passage of the GR340.
Forest path, possible access in vans, the CC may be a little high for the tree branches.
You can hear the road and air traffic in the evening and in the morning but no noise there at night.
We only stayed one night, we didn't see any parking restrictions, to check.

title: (29540) Antequera - 103 Diseminado Poligono 72
description: Plateau off the quiet road, overlooking a beautiful valley. Close to the Lobo Park (Wolf Reserve). No services, please take your litter with you. Possible to park with larger motorhome. Fairly level on the top.

title: (29200) - 169 Calle K Sup
description: Parking day and night in a very quiet area without traffic. A little shade for the summer, a trash can.

title: (29200) Antequera - 8 Cuesta de Talavera
description: Place where there is a source with drinking water

title: (41661) Algámitas - SE-462
description: Starting area of the climb to the rock. only day parking. Do not stay overnight. It has nice picnic area. Keep the area clean.

name: Camping El Penon
title: (41661) Camping El Penon
description: Camping El Penon. Very quiet Sierra access somewhat complicated by the slopes of the road but very good

title: (29200) Antequera - s/n Cuesta de Talavera
description: Parking from shopping center and Carrefour for first night or emergency okay. Night was quiet. Free Wi-Fi from Carrefour. Cheap gas station. WC open from 10.00 - 22.00 clock. Parking in the rear of advantage.

title: (29310) Villanueva de Algaidas - 2 Avenida Escultor Berrocal
title_short: (29310) Villanueva de Algaidas - 2 Avenida Escultor Berrocal
description: RV park with service point outside the village center, easy to find with the coordinates. November 2022, the supply and disposal area has been redesigned, water is available with good pressure
